sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> that's <radical>blue</radical> is <kanji>pure</kanji>. Some tsunami are other colors, like brown or red because they aren't pure, they'll full of trash and poop and other horrible things. But a blue tsunami is completely pure!
meaningInfo: Picture this pure blue tsunami. You can see every crystal clear drop of water in it.
readingMnemonic: Seeing this <kanji>pure</kanji> blue tsunami inspires you to pull out your glowing blue <reading>sa</reading>ber (<ja>せい</ja>)! As the pure water comes toward you, you take one, long slash!
readingInfo: SPLAASHH! The tsunami's pure water splits and it absorbed into your saber. Now it's pure too. And transparent!
